meta.label: Check dataset against reference
meta.description: Compares feature descriptors between a reference and the current dataset

params.name: ds_ref
params.label: Reference dataset
params.description: Dataset on which feature checks are computed

params.name: model_ref
params.label: Reference model
params.description: Model on which feature checks are computed

params.name: columns_dataset
params.label: Columns to check
params.description: If empty, all columns will be checked

params.name: columns_model
params.label: Columns to check
params.description: If empty, all columns used in the model will be checked

params.name: werror
params.label: Raise errors on anomaly
params.description: Ticking this box will raise an error on anomaly instead of a warning

params.name: tolerance
params.label: Tolerance
params.description: Ratio of outlier data allowed compared to reference
